description: Try our easy to follow Seafood & Fennel Salad With Anchovy Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Seafood & Fennel Salad With Anchovy Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 whole anchovies in oil, drained and finely chopped
1 handful fresh flat-leaf parsley, finely chopped
450g ready-cooked mixed seafood (such as prawns, mussels, or squid rings, rinsed and dried)
1 fresh hot green chilli, deseeded and finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: First, make the dressing. In a jug, whisk together the oil and vinegar. Add the anchovies, sugar, and parsley, season well with salt and black pepper, and whisk again.

In a bowl, toss together the salad leaves, fennel, seafood, anchovies, chilli, and coriander. Pour over the dressing, and carefully mix together. Pile up in a shallow serving bowl, and serve with lemon wedges for squeezing over, and some rice noodles.
